  • Constructor Details

    • MobileElements

      public MobileElements​(Sprite sprite, int x, int y)
      The MobileElements constructor
      Parameters:
      sprite - the default sprite of the entity
      x - the initial entity's x on the map
      y - the initial entity's y on the map

  • Method Details

    • entityMove

      public void entityMove​(int x, int y, int sideX, char direction)
      The entityMove method. Allows mobile entities to move on the map.
      Parameters:
      x - the x the entity wants to go (1 goes for right and -1 for left)
      y - the y the entity wants to go (1 goes for down and -1 for up)
      sideX - the side the entity wants to move a stone
      direction - the char that indicates to load the entity's specific sprite

    • loadImage

      public void loadImage​(char direction, Entity entity)
      The loadImage method. Allows the entity to change sprite on the map depending on its movements.
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction of the entity
      entity - the entity

    • incrementDiamondsCounter

      public void incrementDiamondsCounter()
      The incrementDiamondsCounter method. Increase by 1 the diamond counter of the entity.

    • increaseDiamondsCounter

      The increaseDiamondsCounter method.
      Parameters:
      increase - the amount of increase of the counter.

    • getDiamondsCounter

      public int getDiamondsCounter()
      The getDiamondsCounter methods.
      Returns:
      the number of diamonds the entity has

    • getIsAlive

      public boolean getIsAlive()
      The getIsAlive method.
      Returns:
      the status of live of the entity (true = is living).
